name: Floor Of R'yleh
description:
Mr. Fisher, a Historian and Archaeologist by trade, is lowered in to the South Pacific Ocean with the aim to study a newly found artefact. To his horror, this artefact is not a mere totem... but is instead a massive city where the legend, Cthulhu, was said to rest in wait. 

To his amazement... at first... the city started to awaken around him before the horrors took over. From here, it is Mr. Fisher's responsibility to escape before the horrors of the deep consume his sanity and physical being.
